title: A Wizard for Christmas
description: Librarian's Note: This is an alternate cover edition of ASIN B006LEDIIK.In this novella, Holly desperately wants a perfect Christmas, and she's perfectly willing to make herself miserable getting one. Unfortunately, there are mystical forces at play that threaten more than her holidays...her life is in danger. And the only one who seems to know what's going on is a darkly handsome, but mysterious, wizard who makes her want to add "romance" to this year's Christmas wish list.
author: Dorothy McFalls
